name: Nothing but Fluff
summary: Your fluffy interior lacks specific organs and struts, with few weak spots to injure.
description:
Your fluffy interior lacks specific organs and struts, with few weak spots to injure. You gain resistance to precision damage equal to half your level.Traits

Poppet: Small constructs originally designed to serve as companions or servants. They occasionally gain a greater spark of life, transforming them into independent, sapient creatures.
